stimulusHtml: Which of the following would be the best location for a wind farm with ten industrial turbines?
choicesHtml: Adjacent to a wetland area with a large migratory avian population in the fall and spring
Scattered throughout a residential neighborhood where strong wind gusts are common
Just outside a town near a cave housing a large bat population
Arranged uniformly on a local farm that has fields and pastureland for dairy and grain production
